attributes.title: Worst app ever! Donâ€™t waste your time.
attributes.review: Writing this review is the last thing Iâ€™m ever going to do on my phone before I destroy it. Hereâ€™s why. I got this app because I thought it would be funny to help make Trump think that he has more support than he actually does. When I installed it, it instantly gave me an out-of-control virus. A bunch of fat orange sprites popped up on my screen and started wreaking havoc. They deleted my TikTok account and all my cat photos. Then they suddenly disappeared into the maps app, and by the time I opened it, the countriesâ€™ names had been changed. America was labelled as â€œTrumpâ€™s Patriotic Utopiaâ€ and literally every other country was called â€œCommunist Sh*tholeâ€. They were spraying their pixelated piss everywhere except America. But thatâ€™s not even the worst part. The sprites went through all my social media accounts, so they know that Iâ€™m part of antifa. Iâ€™m terrified that theyâ€™re going to show all of their findings to the government and that Iâ€™ll be arrested on â€œdomestic terrorismâ€ charges (because apparently, opposing fascism makes me a dangerous terrorist now). The only reason they arenâ€™t preventing me from writing this review and spreading the truth is because I was able to create a diversion by making a nude photo of Melania my wallpaper and leaving them to gawk at it. But it wonâ€™t be long before they get bored with her and continue to ravage my phone, so Iâ€™m going to destroy it before they can leave the system and report me. Please donâ€™t make the same mistake as me. Find safer ways to troll Trump.
